channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Why are Epstein’s emails full of equals signs?
item.description: Many of the emails released by the Department of Justice from its investigation into Jeffrey Epstein are full of garbled symbols like: Or: The scrambled text is so ubiquitous that it's spurred conspiracy theories that it could be some kind of code. But as believable as it might be that a cabal of elite sex […]

item.title: AI can’t make good video game worlds yet, and it might never be able to
item.description: This is The Stepback, a weekly newsletter breaking down one essential story from the tech world. For more news about video game industry's pushback against generative AI, follow Jay Peters. The Stepback arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 8AM ET. Opt in for The Stepback here. How it started Long before the generative AI explosion, […]

item.title: Sick of charging your Apple Watch every day? The Coros Pace 4 offers up to 19 days of battery, and costs less than an SE 3
item.description: The Coros Pace 4 is a joy to wear during all types of activity, but there's a GPS margin of error.

item.title: Apple Presidents' Day sales: Get the Apple Watch Series 11 for $299, plus more deals to shop this weekend
item.description: Whether you're one of the few people still keeping up with New Year's resolutions or just want an upgraded smartwatch, now is a good time to get an Apple Watch. Currently, the Apple Watch Series 11 is on sale for $299 for Presidents' Day, down from $399. The 25 percent discount brings the 2025 model back down to its record-low price. A number of other Apple devices are on sale for the holiday as well. We named the Apple Watch Series 11 as our choice for best smartwatch overall. It scored a 90 in our review thanks to its 24 hours-plus of battery life and a thin, light design that's easy to wear...

item.title: There's a sneaky way to watch India vs Pakistan at the T20 World Cup for *FREE*
item.description: We've found a sneaky way for you to watch India vs Pakistan in the T20 World Cup 2026 for free.

item.title: Ultra-puissant et livré avec une station de vidange, l’aspirateur-balai Roborock H60 Hub Ultra avale toutes les saletés pour moins de 400 €
item.description: L'aspirateur-balai Roborock H60 Hub Ultra est tout à fait armé pour capturer les saletés qui jonchent vos sols. Et ce n'est même pas le plus onéreux du marché : Amazon l'affiche à 399 euros au lieu de 499,99 euros.

item.title: Even Lenovo is getting concerned about global chip shortages - CEO says world's largest manufacturer will 'expect PC unit sales to face pressure'
item.description: Lenovo warns PC shipments face pressure due to RAM shortages while revenue grows and the AI infrastructure business expands rapidly.

item.title: Wales vs France Free Streams: How to watch Six Nations 2026 online, TV Channels, Preview
item.description: All the ways to watch Wales vs France live streams online – including for FREE – in the 2026 Six Nations Round 2 clash at the Principality Stadium.

item.title: The Nothing That Has the Potential to Be Anything
item.description: You can never truly empty a box. Why? Zero-point energy.

item.title: The Best Samsung Phones of 2026, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From flagship and budget to flipping and folding, Samsung’s Galaxy range spans the breadth of the smartphone cosmos. WIRED’s here to help you make your choice.

item.title: The Mortuary Assistant is my top Shudder recommendation in February - here's why I liked it so much
item.description: The Mortuary Assistant has divided critics, but I had a great time with this new video game adaptation.

item.title: Google’s AI Overviews Can Scam You. Here’s How to Stay Safe
item.description: Beyond mistakes or nonsense, deliberately bad information being injected into AI search summaries is leading people down potentially harmful paths.

item.title: 9 Best Windows Laptops (2026): WIRED-Tested Laptops to Buy
item.description: Windows laptops have never been so good, and they're only going to get better as we move through 2026.

item.title: I’ve driven the most dynamic Porsche Macan ever made – and it also packs some very clever parking tech
item.description: Porsche's GTS badge has always graced the most dynamic models, but can it work on a heavy electric SUV?

item.title: CurrentBody LED Hair Growth Helmet Review: Baby Hairs Abound (2026)
item.description: This FDA-cleared red-light helmet helps spur hair growth and is Bluetooth-enabled with a comfortable design. But don’t expect results overnight.
